title: Bring Down the Exponential
text: Take the logarithm of both sides

title: Apply Log Rule
text: We know that $$n*\log_{a}\left(b\right)=\log_{a}\left(b^n\right)$$. After taking log both sides, the left expression will be $$\log_{10}\left(8^x\right)=x*\log_{10}\left(8\right)$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$ in New Equation
text: $$x*\log_{10}\left(8\right)=\log_{10}\left(98\right)$$ We can solve for $$x$$ and get $$x=(\log_{10}\left(98\right))/(\log_{10}\left(8\right))$$ which approximatly equal to $$2.205$$.
